Package com.shiroyama.chess2.chessboard.controller

package com.shiroyama.chess2.chessboard.controller
The chessboard.controller package provides classes for managing the game state and UI interactions in the Chess2 game. This package contains components that handle game state management, user input processing, board visualization, and geometric utilities for the chess board interface. It serves as the controller layer between the chess board model and the user interface.

Key components include:

  • GameState - Manages the state of the chess board, including turn management, piece selection, and valid move highlighting
  • IntRect - Provides geometric utilities for representing rectangular areas on the chess board with integer coordinates

The controller package works closely with the model package to translate user inputs into game actions and to visualize the current state of the game board.
